channel.title: How do I add items to shops I already have?
channel.description:
Well Title says it all and sorry for asking so many questions on shops they are just one of the things i really dont get :( BTW how do I change how much that item costs to buy??
Well Thanks and Merry Christmas!! XD[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 26, 2009, 12:08:08 am[/size][hr]Anyone Know How to Add it?
